data.title: Brady News
data.text:
11/04/11

This holiday season, catch The Christmas Bunny, starring Florence Henderson, at charity screenings across the country:

11/01/11

Eve Plumb will be joining the cast of Love, Loss, and What I Wore at The Westside Theatre (407 West 43 Street, New York). She will be a part of the cast from November 2nd - December 4th. (More Details)

10/29/11

Christopher Knight has just been cast in the new Rob Zombie film "The Lords of Salem". To be released in 2012. (More Details).

08/25/11

After a two-week gig in Branson, MO, Yakov Smirnoff says they are adding Barry Williams to the theatre lineup in 2012. (More Details to come)

It was announced today that Christopher Knight officially filed for divorce from Adrianne Curry on August 19th. Both parties have said the divorce is mutual and that they continue to be friends.

08/21/11

Geri Reischl ("Jan Brady" from The Brady Bunch Vareity Hour") has a new CD Single out. "Fake Jan" Sings For Real ... "YOUR SONG", a re-recorded groovy version of the classic from "The Brady Bunch Hour" This song is from her forthcoming full length CD "1200 RIVERSIDE" that will be released on November 1, 2011.

Autographed copies of the Single can be purchased at her Official Site. Check out her "groovy photos" that Geri will autograph, along with her other "fun stuff" while you're there.

07/12/11

UPDATED: 07/14/2011

It is with great sadness that we announce the passing of Sherwood Schwartz (1916-2011), the creator of "The Brady Bunch" and "Gilligan's Island". He was a wonderful man who brought joy and laughter to the world.

Mr. Schwartz died at 4 a.m. Tuesday, July 12, 2011 at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, surrounded by his family, where he was being treated for an intestinal infection. Sherwood Schwartz is survived by his wife Mildred, sons Donald, Lloyd and Ross Schwartz, and daughter Hope Juber, along with many grandchildren.

Take a moment to read Mr. Schwartz' Farewell Letter to family and fans.

Please take a moment to sign our Condolence Book, which will be shared with his family.

For more details, here is a list of some of the published obituaries:

Huffington Post

LA Times

NY Times

The Advocate: Brady Kids on Sherwood Schwartz

Hollywood Reporter: Brady Cast Remembers Sherwood Schwartz

Hollywood Reporter: Other Celebrities Twitter about Sherwood Schwartz

(*Photo Courtesy of Ted Nichelson)

06/15/11

The Christmas Bunny Trailer, starring Florence Henderson - Pre-Order the movie.

06/13/11

Susan Olsen is now hosting a Talk-Radio Show on LA Talk Radio - Two Chicks Talking Politics. Currently airing Mondays at 7pm PST. You can listen to past shows online.

05/31/11

Christopher Knight and his wife, Adrianne Curry, have announced that they are officially separated. Their manager, Phil Viardo has said, "The decision was mutually reached after it became clear to both that some perspective was needed in order to assess their unique union. They still love one another, but need some distance to consider their future."

(Read More Details)

03/22/11

This past weekend a new film starring Florence Henderson called The Christmas Bunny premiered at the International Family Film Festival in Hollywood, CA. The film received rave reviews from all that attended, and received 2 awards from the prestigious film panel at the IFFF, taking home both the IFFF Pearl Award and Best Child Actor Award, making The Christmas Bunny the only film in the festival to win two major awards. view the press release, which is accompanied by a short video interview with Florence Henderson, who attended the premiere.

Barry will co-star in a new SYFY movie Bigfoot with Danny Bonaduce. (Source of News)

02/04/11

Eve Plumb has a very in-depth article in OK Magazine. She talks about her current play, her art, and even her openness to another Brady reunion.

01/19/11

It's Official - Florence Henderson is writing her memoirs. Hacheete Book Group has announced that the book will be released in September 2011.

(Read Press Release)
